name: 迈尔斯·罗宾斯 Miles Robbins
movies: 丹尼尔不是真的 Daniel Isn't Real

About　　Musician, DJ and actor who started to off by booking recurring parts on the shows Webseries and Mozart in the Jungle. 　　About　　Musician, DJ and actor who started to off by booking recurring parts on the shows Webseries and Mozart in the Jungle. In 2017, he landed a role in My Friend Dahmer and would then earn major roles in 2018 films titled Taipei, Blockers and Halloween.　　Before Fame　　He was seen in the 1995 movie Dead Man Walking where he was credited as "Boy in Church."　　Trivia　　He authored a column in the Huffington Post called "Is It Really That Strange For a Guy to Wear a Dress?"　　Family Life　　He is the son of Academy Award winning actress Susan Sarandon and Academy Award winning actor Tim Robbins. He has a brother named Jack Miles, and a half-sister named Eva Amurri.　　Associated With　　He would star alongside Graham Phillips in the comedy Blockers.
hezuo: 帕特里克·施瓦辛格 Patrick Schwarzenegger
